Uses of Package
controller

Packages that use controller
Package
Description
controller
 
model
 
ui
 
  • Classes in controller used by controller
    Class
    Description
    DataBaseController
    Controller responsible for managing database operations across different DAOs (UserDAO, ClientDAO, GameDAO, GameSessionDAO).
    MainController
    The central controller of the application, coordinating between the Model (game logic, clients, users) and the View (UI windows).
    Validator
    Class responsible for validating input and output data in the application.
    ViewController
    Controller responsible for managing the application's user interfaces (UIs).
